The image was shared on Facebook: Twitter, and Instagram with claims about Major General Fatima Hemminger being the first Muslim major general in the United States Air Force.
The image was also shared on multiple so: indicating a widespread circulation of the false information.
A reverse image search on Google reveale: featuring Major General Linda S. Hemminger, who is a different person.
The US Air Force website search for: Fatima Hemminger' yielded no results, only showing information about Linda Hemminger and Major General Andrew Croft as the current commander of the Twelfth Air Force unit.
